EmailTemplate.description: Email confirmation for Submitter advising that FPRC is assigned to publication
EmailTemplate.name: FPRC Confirmation for Submitter
EmailTemplate.subject: FPR {!Publication__c.Name} has been Assigned to an FPR Coordinator
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Do not reply to this email message.
FPR {!Publication__c.Name} has been assigned to {!Publication__c.Assigned_FPRC__c} for processing.
Contact your assigned FPR coordinator if you have questions or need support.
Thank you,
FPR System
